item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @God_Zilla God Zilla
item.description:
@God_Zilla wrote:

[For Player rights 3: Owner] Open Client.java and put this under any of ur commands if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 3)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @War_Man War Man
item.description:
@War_Man wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("putanynamehere") || playerRights >= 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Put that below any of your other commands and when you’ve done it, compile your server and use this command like this (for a blue partyhat) :
::pickup 1042 1

This, in easier terms, is used like this, ::pickup itemid# amountyouwant
To add it, simply search for if (command and after the last } of that command, add this command, and your done (you have to compile though.)

Read full topic
